description: This file contains a collection of C++ source files related to the AppGateway plugin of a larger project. It includes implementation files for the main application gateway, responder mechanisms, resolver, and module management, all part of a plugin architecture.

classes.name: AppGateway
classes.description: Main class implementing the application gateway plugin functionalities.

classes.name: Responder
classes.description: Handles response mechanisms within the plugin.

classes.name: Resolver
classes.description: Provides resolution services for the plugin.

classes.name: Module
classes.description: Manages module lifecycle and registration within the plugin framework.

methods.name: Deinitialize
methods.description: Cleanly shuts down the plugin or component.

methods.name: HandleRequest
methods.description: Processes incoming requests to the plugin.
